vaccinepage.title: Jakk Mōkaj Uwaak(QR) Cabro
vaccinepage.subtitle: Kōṇaan tteiñ jako ko jan nan kōṃanṃan mokaj uwaak(QR) kabro

dashboardpage.content1: Karuwanene nan ko Iaaṃ Jarom COVID-19 Jaak Jeje Kkar. Mọọna jet tipdik lol nan bok a link nan a QR kabro kab laam jarom ar in ami COVID-19 jaak jeje. Ne eok konaan nan ded tilmaak in wa, eok kuwat mooror or ko jarom ak a kōn eoonin ko jeje eok'wotomjej bok jan ko kkar.
dashboardpage.content2: Armej tollok a nukwi Māe jeben bwijin jaak jeje doulul ippa a jalen teiñwa nōṃba or lōta jipij, moon kajjo laam jarom jaak jeje kajjitōk jepel.
dashboardpage.content3: Ko kkar naloma a ḷaaṃ jarom ar in konnaan wa jeje. Ne eok bok ami wa jan a ṃweed wōpij (Department of Defense, Indian Health Services, or Veterans Affairs (Department in jalitak, ajejin keenki jakeiie, ak jerbal)), eok naaj aikuj nan kokkeitaak ran koṃbani bwe rejetak.
dashboardpage.content4: Ne eok jeban kajjitōk tarrin ami ḷaaṃ jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje ilomej ko mmakijkij kajjitōk kajjitok (<1>FAQ</1>).

vaccineform.filloutheader: Konaan tteiñ jake ko wadu kūraaṇto nan bok a kkejel nan a QR kabro/ laam jarom ar ak ami COVID-19 jaak jeje:
vaccineform.title: Kūtarre eọroñ naan
vaccineform.subtitle: Aikuj kūraaṇto kakōḷḷe ippa*
vaccineform.phoneemailinfo: Naloma a katmāne teinwa ak lota ke Māe ḷo doulul ippa ami wa jeje. Ne eok wōjak jab bok a kkar mooror ami katmane teinwa, mālejjoñ bar mooror ami lota jipij.
vaccineform.pincode: Komanman a 4-laam jarom PIN nompa. Eoknaajr bok li kkejel nann moon he PIN nompa kab ak ami laam jarom wa jeje. *
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg1: PIN ban kopool 4 kij lokwan doon nompa
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg3: Ko PIN moon ane utaṃwe. Konaan ekajet ḷe waḷọk ko kkejel naloma nan eok nan re-moon ami PIN.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg4: Konaan ekajet ami wadu ṇae for 1 jekōn.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg5: Konaan kokkeitaak kōj ak ami keeñkikōjelbabō naloma bwe bar eọroñ naan ak jepak.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg6: Jen kuwat jab jen ami kajjitōk, konaan ekajet bar.
vaccineform.pinErrorMsg7: Utaṃwe ṃool jepa, konaan ekajet bar
vaccineform.note: <0>Mejek:</0> Ami PIN ane aikuj nan pojak ak ami laam jarom jeje.
vaccineform.checkboxdescription: Le jāāk eñeo bọọk, eok kuwat kōnnaan lọrun kaje in bōd under konnaan kab ṃweed kien ke eok kuwat ko meanwōd or jelpa/kalliṃur int ke meanwōd kab kuwat uweoṃaan kōmaroñto ak ko meanwōd pojak jeje.
vaccineform.safe: Paan, ineemman, kab tokja COVID-19 wa kuwat kiio kkake nan wotomjejjuon epepen 5 kab rutto, <1>tok wa</1>.
vaccineform.fhealthcareprofessional: Keenkikojelbabo wājepdik ak ṃōn taktō wōja
vaccineform.enterPin: Konaan moon ko PIN nomba eok kōṃanṃan nan kajjitōk akto ami wa jeje.

qrpage.title: Rekoot in Kein Kamool COVID-19 eo am Make ilo Kein Jerbal Kapeel
qrpage.name: Etam:
qrpage.minrequirementsandroid: Mennin aikuj ko rediktata: Android mottan 5 im Google Play mottan 21.18 & lonlok.
qrpage.minrequirementsios: Mennin aikuj ko rediktata: Ilo juon kein jerbal kapeel in iOS, kojerbal Safari nan am lale web eo.
qrpage.incorrect: Ne ebōd melele eo ilo rekoot in wa eo am ilo kein jerbal kapeel eo ak ejab walok juon wa kwar boke, ebōd raan ko ak etan wa eo, kwomaron aikuj kokkaal rekoot in wa eo am. <1>Kwōmaron kebaak takto eo am nan kokkaal rekoot eo am ne ejab kebaak tok kim</1>. Kim naj kebaak kwe kin ta melele ko emoj amim loi im komadmod ko kim naj kommani iloan 2-3 wiik.

receivedpage.title: Iaam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje kajjitōk rijjiit
receivedpage.content1: Ami kajjitok mmo kwo bok. Ne ko melele naloma kkars ko melele for arro kkar, eok naaj bok a kkejel nan ak ami COVID-19 jaak jeje.
receivedpage.content2: Ne eok to jab bok a kkejel tollok 24 awa, konaan ekajet bar kab kau ṃool ami atlep, raan in ḷotak, teinwa ak lota mājet ko melele naloma ilo ko alen in ami wa.
receivedpage.content3: Ne eok jeban kajjitōk tarrin ko <1>Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje</1>, jan jeban uwaak. Ilomej arro Mmakijkij Kajjitōk (<3>FAQ</3>).

faqpage.title: FAQS
faqpage.01question: Et ane a laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje?
faqpage.01answer: Ami <1>laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje</1> ane ka jarom wa jeje drawn jan ko nomba kōttōn for ko konnaan pojak ukeḷọk. Ko laam jarom jeje kowaḷọk ko āi melele as ami peba Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Buḷōn bwe Nañinmej Kabwijer kab Deṃak) COVID-19 wa pile: ami atlep, raan in ḷotak, wa raan kab tor in wa eok pok. Ko laam jarom jeje kab kōpooḷ a QR kabro bwe naat kakōlkōl ḷe a SMART Health Card (penawiie keeki pile) reader naaj aloklok nan ko waak ami atnak, raan in ḷotak, wa raan kap wa tor. Ko QR kūro bar kaṃool ko wa jeje ke ka wōpij jeje in ami konnaan.
faqpage.02question: Jete naaj aō jaak jeje jọ bōkḷamleḷọk?
faqpage.02answer: Naat ami jaak jeje ane wawa, eok naajl bok a kkaejel bōkḷamleḷọk nan ko lota ak katmana teinwa nomba ṃōttippa ko wa jeje. Lak moon ami emān-ikjet PIN, eok naaj allolo ami COVID-19 jaak melele kōpooḷ ami atnak, raan in ḷotak, wa raan(s), kab wa rowālọk. Eok naaj bar bok a kakōlkōl QR kabro kaṃool ami jaak jeje ane lukwi.
faqpage.03question: Kuwat I lọmọọr aō laam jarom jaak jeje ioo ka Nateinwa?
faqpage.03answer:
Eok kuwat lọmọọr ami laam jarom jaak jeje nan ko Apple Health app ippa ko iOS 15 ṃadṃōd kkar. Eok naaj aikuj nan mooror ami Safari web daṃ nan weeppān ko jepekō.
Ukoktak, eok kuwat take a okwāt in ami <1>laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje kab lọmọọr it nan ami pija.
faqpage.04question: Kuwat Na lomoor ao laam jarom jaak jeje ioo ao Maanteinwa tuul?
faqpage.04answer:
Aet. Eok kuwat lomoor ami <1>laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje nan Google Play ne eok jeban Android version 5 kab Google Play Services version 21.18 ak lōñ.
Eok kuwat bar okwat ami <3>laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje kab lamoor e nan ami pija.
faqpage.05question: E Na bok uñar kuko, naaj er āñin ewe ao laam jarom jaak jeje?
faqpage.05answer:
Eaab. Ne eok bok an unar kuko ak booster kuko, e naajnot ṃootka kōḷmānḷọkjeṇ ewe ami laam jarom jaak jeje. Eok naaj aikuj nan jọwiia over for ko <1>laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje kkar nan moa kaal QR kabro.
Jen nōbar kōmḷan 3-7 raan bwe ami kaal kuko nan kowaḷọk lon for ko pojak ukelok.
faqpage.06question: Naat hen naaj ao wa kuko le jake for ao laam jarom jaak jeje?
faqpage.06answer: Mōn taktōjar for ko aetok in alen e uke nan lota kuko melele nan ko pojak ukelok. Jen nōbar kōjjaad 3-7 raan bwe ami kuko nan kowalok lōñ for ko kkar. E ami jejeis wōt jab located, eok Māe <1>kōkkeitaak koj</1>.
faqpage.07question: Ta e ao jeje ane jab wawa?
faqpage.07answer:
Ami wa naloma sublota mits ami wa jeje nan ko pojak ukelok, but er mae jeben naloma melele ke's jọuñ. Toḷọk, e's kōṇaan jen jeben ami jeje, akō jab ami ṃool melele. Bwe waan joñak:

° Katmane teinwa nomba ak lota jipij kwo jab kōpooḷ ak kuko jab mājet
° Atnak ane jipeeḷ āinwōt juon
° Raan in lotak motta jab majet

Nan ppok ami jeje, ekajet re-moon ami melele ippa a āinwōt juon lota ak katmane nomba. E ami jejestill anej'ab wawa, kokkeitaak ami naloma nan ionraan ami wa jeje ak <1>kōkkeitaak koj. nan kajjitōk a ālij in ami jeje. Eokn'aaj jo keeañ in arro llo kab wūno ṃūtō- tollok 2-3 wiik.
E eok pok ami wa jan a ṃweed, epepen (like the Department of Defense, Indian Health Services or Veterans Affairs (abwin ko buñlik in jālitak, ajejin Ḷōktab keenki keiie ak Veterans jerbal)), eok naaj aikuj to kokkeitaak those, epepen pwe rejetak ippa ami wa.
faqpage.08question: Ta e ao laam jarom jaak jeje ane koba?
faqpage.08answer: E ko melele ewe ami iaam jarom wa jeje ke koba ak jako a kuko, apan bōd raans ak bōd kakōḷḷe), ami may aikuj nan ṃool ak ionraan ami pojak jeje. Eok kuwat jokwōd ami naloma nan ionraan ami jeje ak <1>kōkkeitaak koj</1>. Eok naaj jo keeañ in arro ppok kab wūno pātōñtōñ tollok 2-3 wiik.
faqpage.09question: Ekōjkan motta ko laam jarom COVID-19 wa jeje kkar jerbal?
faqpage.09answer: Ko <1>ko Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje kkar</1> kkar jebo COVID-19 jeje jan ko konnaan pojak kkar. Moon ami atnak, raan in lotak, kab an lota ak katmane teinwa nomba doulul ippa ami wa jeje, jujen kōṃanṃan a emān laam jarom PIN nomba. E ko melele eok lota mājet ko wōpij jeje, eok naaj bok a Iñlij ak lota ippa a kkejel nan ami <3>ko Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje kkar</3>. Moon ko PIN eok komanman nan mmat ko jeje.
faqpage.10answer:
Aet. Tteiñ jake ko jan ewe ko kkar motta jab nalma idiñ ak nan ami jaak jeje. Ko kkejel nan ko jaak jeje requires a PIN ke eok komanman kab ane bam wōt nan ko katmane teinwa ak lota ke ane doulul ippa ami pojak jeje.
Ko QR kabro ane a SMART Health Card (penawiie keenki pile), a pojak ar in ami jaak jeje. Bar melele ane ilo <1>https://smarthealth.cards. Nan oṇaak ami ttino, ko QR kabro kuwat wot jo kakōlkōl kab waak le a SMART Health Card-kinaak kinaak.
faqpage.11answer:
Aet. Eok jeben 24 awa jan ko alen eok bok ko kkejel nan moon ami emānlaam jarom PIN kab ak ami <1>ko Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje kkar.Ne eok toj'ab, ko kkejel nan ami laam jarom jeje naaj ḷot ak eok kuwat jjino lok kab jaruk ami PIN mooror ko <3>ko Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje kkar kkar.
Ne eok kuwatj'ab keememej ami PIN, lak 24 awa eok kuwat mooror ko ainwot juon jepekōḷ kab komanman a kāāl PIIN.
<5>MEJEK: Juon alen eokje'ben ak ami laam jarom jeje kab lomoor ami QR pile, e motta jab lot.
faqpage.12question: Naaj iiō naloma tilmaa in ao wa kadkad?
faqpage.12answer:
Aet. E ane juon in <1>iiet kkaalel bwe nalma ami <3>ko Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje kkar kab kuwat jo jenok ak likōmjāje laam jarom. Eok Māe bar likōmjāje ami Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Buḷōn bwe Nañinmej Kabwijer kab Deṃak) naloma COVID-19 pile ak ami konnaan pojak jeje.
Eok kuwat jab wadu nan bōk a <5>ko Kaajai COVID-19 Wotom Jeje kkar. E ane ka kkāālel wūnin tōl nan bōk ami COVID-19 jaak melele, kab ane ko laam jarom eoon in ami peba jaak jeje. E ane juon in ko kkāālel nan likōmjāje tilmaa in wa. Ko konnaan naaj jab jo kein jerbal a aikuj kijoonaba kkar.
faqpage.13question: Da e na aikuj nan jeḷañ ao wa pile?
faqpage.13answer: Ko kkar naloma a laam jarom ar in ami jaak jeje. Ilo eokje'ben jebwābwe ami peba jaak jeje, eok mae jenok jake ami laam jarom jeje kab mooror e. Ne eok luuj ami <1>laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje</1>, eok kuwat kojak ko jepekol ḷọk ioo ko kkar.
faqpage.14question: Da waḷọk nan ao melele lak Na ded e?
faqpage.14answer: Ami <1>laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje</1> jammok ko ainwot juon melele ke ami peba Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Buḷōn bwe Nañinmej Kabwijer kab Deṃak) wa pile. Eok kuwat tūñañ doulul bwe kuwat kakōlkōl ko QR kabro for ami <3>laam jarom COVID-19 wa jeje</3> ewi er kuwat mooror ami ṃool ak ne er kuwat dāpdep e. Wot eok kuwat pepe wāwee kab naat nan jaketo-jaketak ami jeje.
faqpage.15question: Da ne Na ioo bwijin wa jitōñ bwe bwijin armej ippa a single teinwa nomba?
faqpage.15answer: Ne eok kuwat a jelpa ak jiniet kab jeben komanman bwijin jiton ippa a kajjojo teinwa nomba ak lota, moon ko kajjitōk juon ilo a alen nan bok jepel kkejel bwe kajjo jaak jeje.
faqpage.needhelpcontent01: Bwe kajjitōk kab juon rejetak, kokkeitaak:
faqpage.needhelpcontent06: NOTE: Jan'kuwat wōda nan lonraan ami laam jarom COVID-19 jaak jeje ḷọk ko teinwa.
